arts.sum: Ole Werner faces a baptism of fire as RB Leipzig head coach when his side visit defending Bundesliga champions Bayern Munich in the opening fixture of the 2025/26 season on Friday. Ole Werner : "It’s been a lot of hard work, which is always the case at the start of a new job.
